review: I had high expectation for this product and it delivered.  We have owned an Apple TV, Chromecast and Roku 3 and I have had no luck direct playing from my Plex server.  Most of my files are H.264 with AC3 and the Roku 3 will not play the audio and have to use a computer or table with Chromecast can be hit or miss.  I have since started using the Fire TV and it works get with every file.  I also like the speed of the menus and ease of use.  I keep my fingers crossed that they will interconnect the Amazon Echo and Fire TV functions to use voice commands.
